content.label: The controls are AWFUL. Some levels are literally impossible on the first few tries, and you lose stars with every death. Horribly executed piece of garbage. First one was actually decent. ‚Äî Quite frankly, you could make a better game with a wheel of cheese and a screwdriver.
When are we getting part 3??? I beat the game twice already now lol. Keep making this game. There‚Äôs nothing like it.

This game is super fun and when I say super I mean SUPER fun. It has no ads and very slight bugs. it also has all the elements of a good action game. It‚Äôs a game I would pay up to fifty bucks for. Getting this game on steam is fifty bucks so mobile is a way better deal because it‚Äôs cheaper, has easier controls, and it‚Äôs on your mobile device so it‚Äôs a portable, awesome, action game. Definitely worth buying! Please make more.

title.label: One of the best games I played

content.label: It truly is an amazing experience

This game is amazing with lots of potential for huge success. However this is (in my view) in need of more levels that are harder and more unique. I think it would be great if more enemies are created. Perhaps a robot that when you destroy it, it creates or transforms into small robots that chase you down and do damage if they touch you (destroying them in the process) or perhaps enemies that can throw turrets when they see you, or think they see you. I like the new addition of Ava and her being the master mind is great. However, to me, this story was very different that the original and I was not as big of a fan. Also if you are wondering about the price believe me the app it‚Äôs self is worth it. However, the extension isn‚Äôt a great deal, however I expect they will add more great levels to it and make the purchase worth it.

title.label: Just something to possibly make the game better

content.label: I love the game in all but I wish that you can grab someone and poking a gun at there head when you are really hurt so the bad guys would freeze and you can let them go or shoot them?
This is a good game. Lots of thought went into the design, and controls.

title.label: No ads, No stupid credits to buy, just an AWESOME gameplay! ‚òÑÔ∏èüí•üèÖ

content.label:
Didn‚Äôt play the part 1, thought I‚Äôd start with the 2nd first. So tired of these bs money-grabbing credit games, I never pay for those and end up quitting just a short while into the game because you can‚Äôt do anything unless you pay them a ton of money.

This game is awesome, and pretty cheap. Fun gameplay. There‚Äôs action but also thinking. Reminds me a bit of old Nintendo games, but with much better graphics and better gameplay of course. If you‚Äôre into this kind of games buy it for sure, you won‚Äôt be disappointed. The aiming/shooting takes a little getting used to, but it wouldn‚Äôt be as fun if it was first person style I think. Another great game you should check out (not in a similar genre, just a cool game) Galaxy on Fire 2. That one also worth buying the extra missions. Also Fallout Shelter is super fun, and that one is free. I would pay just to reward the developers, but I buy pc versions of all Fallout games so I‚Äôll just consider this a bonus. But I digress... or not. Games are fun, and I don‚Äôt even play that many, just the best ones, and these I listed are the best. ü§òüë®‚Äçüíªüëç
Beau, amusant, j'adore.

This game and its prequel are probably some of the most unique and creative game on the App Store. The controls are awesome and easy, plus the plot is so involving and creative! I still just love the idea of mixing cowboys and  bandits with the final frontier! Totes the best game I ever played.

Definite improvement over the first game.  Replay value is great but you're going to find that it's very simple after not long

Ava update is well worth the money. Some levels are genuinely difficult.  I was bummed out that there were no time trials in the second game.

title.label: One of my most favorite iPhone games!

content.label:
Offers hours of entertainment (if you try to get 100% on all levels)! Loved also the Ava story line (extra $), maybe even more than Burt as it relies more on tactics than fire power. 

What makes the Space Marshall series so good is that they are made for smaller screens while offering beautiful graphics and immersive gameplay. In my opinion, they should have invited you to the stage in one of the keynotes - Apple, this company makes your device a serious gaming platform!
I like this game and also the previous one.But I want to see more main stories updated.Because I want to play more.
This game is amazing and one of my favorite mobile games ever. Each mission is unique and the level design is immersive. The combat system is amazingly satisfying and fun. Completely worth the $4.99.

This game is worth every cent! It‚Äôs one of the best games out of hundreds I‚Äôve played ever. It is well balanced not too easy or hard and has smooth easy controls even for smaller phones. The quests and game mechanics are fun and easy to understand. Finally the reward system and item selection is very fair, unique, and balanced! All in all this will be one of the greats in adventure smart phone games! Please make more of these third person games; with the marshal or with new genres! Thank you for an amazing game!
This is a great game. Easy to learn, good controls. But, it eats through battery life.

title.label: Worth every penny, great Ava story line

content.label: Need more iap mission! Will buy more missions! Good jobs!

title.label: 3 reasons this is the best game on the App Store

content.label: In my opinion this is the best game on the App Store. 1) no  ridiculous in app purchases that cost $99 (which you‚Äôre forced to buy over and over agin to maintain any sane gameplay). 2) Long levels, that require thinking and good strategy (good strategy game are hard to come by here). 3) great new updates.

title.label: Frustrating control and a freaking bug

content.label: I love the first space marshal and this second one. Somehow in the Ava mission the control isn't as smooth as the first one. When I try to shoot and move, there is a delay and my character doesn't move as I intended. My character died a couple of time but that was not big deal. The most frustrating part is at mission 4 where whenever I die, no matter how careful I want to click on "restart at a check point", the mission restarts. I have been doing the mission 4 for 3 times already. When my character dies, the mission restart regardless of me choosing the check point. This makes the game extremely difficult as I can't die in order to pass this mission. I looked for game support in the settings. I found none. This review only reflects part of this game. I still like this game if the bugs are fixed.
Needs more Ava missions and we need to see what Garth does while everybody is off on missions and we need more drones and maybe a Blackburn dlc

First off, I got this on sale and I feel kind of guilty about it.  This would be a $20 game on Steam.  
Incredibly sharp visual style.  Great stealth action.  Charming bits of story.  Huge amount of weaponry and armor available as mission rewards.  
I played each level several times, happily.
The missions take a while (10-20 minutes?), so you have to sit down with a bit of time for this.  That's honestly the only negative about it.
I almost never play a game to 100% completion, even if I like the game.  It takes a lot to keep me coming back.  But I'm getting close to that with this game, and I'm still going back for more.
Excellent gameplay, mechanics, controls, music, these guys nailed it.

Absolutely LOVE the Space Marshal games. Beautiful graphics, great gameplay and humorous storyline. I really enjoy this style of game where depending on my mood I can be stealthy or run and gun. I was eager to try the new Ava expansion mission and was ‚Äúblown away‚Äù by how fun it was to launch enemies into the air! This is oddly therapeutic. üòú My only critique would be to allow a way to skip some of the dialogue for replays. Keep this missions coming please.

title.label: So glad to have new levels!

content.label:
I can't tell you how excited I was to see this in the app store! I snatched it up the second I saw it, and have been playing ever since. It's amazing so far - just as fun as the first, and all new adventures! I highly recommend this, and you don't have to play the first one to enjoy the second one (though it's amazing too - I recommend both). High replay value, and loads of fun!

Update: So now there are new levels with Ava! I'm so glad. I think they're well worth the small price, and hope to see more of this in the future. I am glad the game creators are continuing on this project; it's my favorite game. So Ava is different - more strategic, which I really like! She doesn't have the firepower, so you are forced to use stealth mode a lot and do some takedowns. It's a fun new challenge!

Enjoyed the sequel a lot. Usually I don‚Äôt do in-app purchases but this time I wanted to give it a try because the game has been so good. Unfortunately, it won‚Äôt let me purchase the game and keeps asking me to sign in where it just hangs. Don‚Äôt know where the issue is I‚Äôm hoping it get fixed soon.

Love this game! As others have said, the Ava missions require a different strategy but they are just as fun. Kinda miss the big gun, though. One suggestion - please allow an option to turn off the story mode. At least after the first play though.
I loved the first and second versions, then for them to release a paid DLC. Thought they would be better than that.

I loved the first one. I love this one too. There are no games like this in the entire App Store. The controls are very well made.(this is the type of game that if the controls weren't made well, it would mess up the whole thing). The story is hilarious and interesting. But what truly amazes me are game mechanics and the gameplay. It is extremely addicting to shoot and sneak attack outlaws (by the way I love the new sneak attack feature). YOU CAN EVEN DUCK BEHIND THINGS! It's the mechanics of a real gunfight in the Wild West. Rapping this up, I HUGELY recommend this to virtually anybody.

Ava Mission Pack Review

The minute I saw the developers had made a new pack add - on, I bought it. It only cost $3! Honestly, it should have cost at least $5 judging by its quality. I feel like we are robbing the developers. Anyways, I love the drones. They are so amazing to control (especially the demolition drones. I love zooming into a group of enemies and then blowing them up). The main reason I did this review was because THERE IS A HUGE GLITCH, the kind that helps players. On level 11, The Exorcism, there is a huge glitch. When you plug in TAMI a.k.a. GAIA and GAIA tells you to go get TAMI and leave, if you go close but not to close to      TAMI, and press the button to get her, GAIA will not take TAMI away, and you will get TAMI. Then, you don't have to get all of TAMI's shards and you skip literally half the level.

I was having fun until the ‚ÄòQuartermaster‚Äô level and it was one of the most poorly designed levels in stealth-games. This level alone turned me off from the game. This level need to either be seriously reworked or remove entirely. Otherwise, O cannot give anything higher than a 2.

title.label: Still having issues on Ava 2nd level with 1.3.3

content.label:
2nd level still loads wrong character and has no weapons. Hopefully they will fix otherwise it's a waste of $3. How do I get money back?

Turns out you need to delete and reload to get the update to work. You‚Äôll lose your data but the game will work. Updated to 4 stars

Thanks to everyone who made this game happen!  You did good.
   I‚Äôve gotten hours of enjoyment, and very much appreciate your efforts to improve and update the game.
  I plan to keep watching for updates and new versions.
  So if Ava is learning to do what Burton does but with finesse, is he gonna learn to pilot the ship?  Sounds like a crash course?
Please fix the Ava add-on. The weapons are weak, she is weak. Nothing near the experience of the main story. I absolutely loved the main story. Love the diversity of weapons.
Pixelbite knows their gaming, just a superb adfenture and definitely check out the Ava update

title.label: Control elements tiny on iPhone X

content.label: Love this game. Latest update supports the iPhone X screen resolution but the UI/control elements in the corner are tiny. Suspect they need to be adjusted for the higher pixel density of the new screen.
bug it‚Äôs not fixed yet
This is one of my favorite games. However on the Ava addition on map two I have the wrong character and load out. I can not progress in the game until this is fixed.
Even after the bug fix update Ava still loads incorrectly without any weapons.
So I bought the Ava storyline packs and can‚Äôt beat the 2nd level of Ava‚Äôs storyline because the game doesn‚Äôt let me have any gear or guns making it impossible to pass the level

title.label: Greatest mobile game I ever played!

content.label:
This game was one of the biggest hits I ever seen and this is a series I love so much and with the DLC as well it is greater like the game itself.

Please make a 3rd Sequel. I am now a fan of this game!
Hope you live a great life developers!

title.label: Great game! But needs to be updated for iPhone X

content.label: Tons of fun unique weapons and all around just a great mobile game! The only downfall at the moment is its next to unplayable on iPhone X. The graphics are very fuzzy and text is almost illegible. Once that‚Äôs worked out I‚Äôd highly recommend everyone give this game a go.

I play a lot of games on my phone. Space Marshals 2 is by far the best platformer ever. Maybe a tie with Solomon's Keep. Any negative reviews are due to crappy old phones or non gamers. Get it. It's worth every penny.

title.label: How a Sequel Should be Done

content.label:
Other developers take note: this is how a sequel should be done! The first Space Marshals was amazing, but with this sequel they did it perfectly. A few things added, and a few small tweaks here and there to add a bit of enhanced gameplay, but nothing too crazy. It‚Äôs fine to take risks, but this is a prime example of how keeping a sequel mostly unchanged can work wonders.
I cannot wait for Space Marshals 3! It is bound to be a thing of beauty. Thank you so much, Pixelbite, for these amazing games!
Keep it up!!!

title.label: In my opinion it is the best game of 2017

content.label: This is the best game you are in the future and have a wide variety of weapons and customization for your character. If you are stuck on why to get it because it is 3rd person view it actually helps because you can see people behind objects so you can have better sneak attacks and if you are worried about sniping the sniper rifles make you see farther. If you are stuck because of the price I am just going to say go ahead and get it.
Game 3plzüòÄüòÄ

This is such an outstanding game it has just the right combination of strategy problem solving and straightforward shooter all in one!  If you were ever a fan of Firefly or Serenity, you will absolutely love this game!!!! The bonus for this one is by purchasing it, it's available on your iOS device as well as your Apple TV but for optimal gameplay I would recommend getting a wireless controller...such as the Nimbus... absolutely solid controller and delivers solid Xbox/PlayStation like gameplay!  This is an absolutely solid game that is addictive enjoyable and refreshingly original...it doesn't disappoint!!!!
It‚Äôs a great game but it won‚Äôt let me start the next mission hopefully you guys can fix that for me.
What a update! Great control, great gameplay, smooth graphics, cant say enough to this masterpiece.

I love this game!! I'm addicted to it!! Weapons earned after each missions are awesome. I wish the difficulty level could be increased/ decreased. This game reminds me of Project Overkill on PS1. Is there a third installment coming soon? I hope so!!
Completa la historia del primero, es lo mejor!!!
Please please please please add multiplayer. It would greatly add to the playtime.
